text: Yakshcho vy kolysʹ dyvuyetesya, realʹne zdyvuvannya yikh kazhe: "Pislya my povertayemo u pyl, my pryyizhdzhayemo recreated shche raz?" Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto disbelieved u yikhnʹomu Lordi. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto zaznaly kaydaniv navkolo yikhnikh shyy. Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto zaznaly Pekla, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
